text: “allah veta æti mitat vada napuru phalavipaka (at kara gat ayava) ma obata dænum dennada?”yi (nabiye! oba ovungen vimasa), “allah kavurunva sapa kara, ovun mata kopayata patva, ovungen samaharekuva vanduran bavatada, uran bavatada pat kaleda ovunda, kavurun boru devivarunva namadinnoda ovunda, itamat bala vargaye ayayi. tavada ovun rju margayen værada giya ayayi” yayi oba pavasanu (mænava)
